fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
REFIT: Evaluation of Council Directive 89/391/EEC of 12 June 1989 on the introduction of measures 
to encourage improvements in the safety and health of workers at work and 23 related directives. 
 
 
Revision of CMD Directive 
Establishment of European wide binding occupational exposure limit values and their implementation
organisation_name: ECFIA Representing the High Temperature Insulation Wool Industry (ECFIA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
- promote hygiene and safety in the manufacturing and use of high temperature insulation materials 
- promote understanding and management of HSE matters  
- dissseminate information regarding HS and environmental benefits related to high temperature insulation wools 
- initiate research programmes to improve scientific knowledge on high temperature insulation wools
relevant_communication:
cooperation in Cross Industry Initiative promoting OSH regulations for worker protection  
 
 
 
Position paper on exposure risk relationship models
